title: The Nature of Haxe and OpenFL
description: A series of Haxe and OpenFL videos based on "The Nature of Code" by Christopher Butler.

videos.title: Prologue A - What is "The Nature of Code"?
videos.description:
So I'm starting another vlogtorial... thing...

This time I plan to go through the (FREE) Processing tutorial book called "The Nature of Code". Except, instead of using Java and Processing, I will use... Haxe and OpenFL, of course!

Nature of Code: http://natureofcode.com/

Music: http://ccmixter.org/files/VJ_Memes/33361
"Shananigans" by Jeris licensed under (CC BY-SA 3.0)

videos.title: Prologue B - Variables
videos.description:
So before we get into the meat of the book, let's go over some basics. This time, variables!

(Aplologies, I am down a monitor and the resolution is a bit... nonstandard.. so the code might be difficult to read.)

Nature of Code: http://natureofcode.com/

Tools Used:
FlashDevelop: http://www.flashdevelop.org/
OpenFL: http://www.openfl.org/

Music: http://ccmixter.org/files/VJ_Memes/33361
"Shananigans" by Jeris licensed under (CC BY-SA 3.0)

videos.title: Prologue H - "Processing-like" Setup
videos.description:
We cover a wide variety of topics to get this processing like system set up. As per usual, I don't really know what I'm doing, so I'm am definitely open to suggestions on how better do things.

Table of Contents:
Change application settings with project.xml "window" tag: 3:00
Event Handlers / Basic "Game" Loop: 6:32
Delta Timer: 12:55
Displaying Simple Graphics: 23:12

Nature of Code: http://natureofcode.com/

Tools Used:
FlashDevelop: http://www.flashdevelop.org/
OpenFL: http://www.openfl.org/

Music: http://ccmixter.org/files/VJ_Memes/33361
"Shananigans" by Jeris licensed under (CC BY-SA 3.0)
